feed.title: GitHub Markdown Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Markdown in GitHub

entry.title: seanpm2001/Proper-CommonMark-Standard_Docs
entry.summary: ⬇️Ⓜ️🪧️📖️ The official documentation source repository for the Proper CommonMark standard, a fork of Markdown to fix the shortcomings of GitHub Flavored Markdown, and ensure changes don't disrupt or destroy existing works.

entry.title: seanpm2001/Internet-Explorer6-Flavored-Markdown
entry.summary: 6️⃣️⬆️🇪 The official source repository for IE6 Flavored Markdown (not part of Internet Explorer or by Microsoft) for implementing modern GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) and also criticizing it for its problems.
